author: marchhill
content: I've made a PR to the EIP to expand on the EL implementation and added the engine API changes. Please could you review and check if I'm missing anything <@845691100072509460> and others? https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9381

author: jih2nn
content: Thanks for the work! I've left some comments. Please check it when you have some time.
